channel.title: Whats wrong with this code

item.title: Whats wrong with this code
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

better one

add this in the beginning of client.java [import]

import java.text.*;

and the commandâ€¦

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { // the best way i think , i loot i BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/noclips.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip"); bw.newLine(); bw.write("Look him up and pm him in the game"); bw.newLine(); bw.write("Thank-You , Mod_pur3 or I loot i"); bw.newLine(); bw.newLine(); bw.write("===================="); bw.newLine(); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("FFS , You Have Luck !"); } } disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " <== Nocliped"); }

item.title: Whats wrong with this code

item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights == 0) { teleportToX = 3230; teleportToY = 3407; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; disconnected = false; Teleblock(); sendMessage("trying to spawn are we n33b?"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "noob "+playerName+" tried to noclip now hes in a cage!!"; }
